column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ At 8.50 pm on 19 September 2018
column4: a worker at a factory producing stainless tanks Stung Meanchey was electrocuted. The Victim An ------Borith
column6: 19 years old was from------ Kampong Cham province.------After hearing his screams
column7: the victim was found with an electric extension cable in his hand
column8: which was burning him. He was taken to Khmer-Soviet Hospital
